web_snippets: David Farrier ... Not to be confused with David Farrar (blogger). David Andrew Farrier (born 25 December 1982) is a New Zealand journalist and actor. He has ...
From a nuclear lake to a haunted forest, journalist David Farrier visits unusual -- and often macabre -- tourism spots around the world.
David Farrier is a New Zealand born journalist and documentary maker currently based in LA. In 2023 he released his latest documentary Mister Organ.
